hadith.arabic-text: حدثنا مسدد، حدثنا يحيى، عن ابن عجلان، بهذا الحديث مختصرا قال ‏"‏ فليؤذنه ثلاثا فإن بدا له بعد فليقتله فإنه شيطان ‏"‏ ‏.‏
hadith.english-text: The tradition mentioned above has also been transmitted by Ibn 'Ajilan through a different chain of narrators briefly. This version has: He should give it a warning three times. If it appears to him after that, he should kill it, for it is a devil.
